description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget screen for managing orders in an admin interface. It includes UI components such as headers, order listing grids, and individual order cards with status updates and action buttons. It also manages permissions and role-based access.

classes.name: AdminOrdersManagementScreen
classes.description: Main screen widget for displaying and managing orders with role-based access control.

classes.name: _NeonSectionHeader
classes.description: A header widget with decorative neon gradient styling for sections.

classes.name: _OrdersGrid
classes.description: A widget to display a grid of order cards.

classes.name: _OrderCard
classes.description: Widget representing an individual order with status and action buttons.

classes.name: _NeonPlaceholder
classes.description: A placeholder widget displayed when there are no orders.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for AdminOrdersManagementScreen, including permission check, header, order list, or unauthorized placeholder.

methods.name: _statusColor
methods.description: Returns a color corresponding to the order status.

methods.name: _statusLabel
methods.description: Returns a string label for the order status.

methods.name: _nextStatus
methods.description: Determines the next order status in the workflow.
